channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank）房地产业务主管告诉 @路透社，德国正在经历一场长达四年的房地产危机，这场危机将导致更多的损失和无用房产的不良销售。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Germany is midway through a four-year real estate crisis that will lead to more losses and distressed sales of unwanted properties, the head of Commerzbank's real estate business told @Reuters. More here: https://t.co/58nAChAWOm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 波音公司的安全危机扰乱了航空公司的商业计划，航空公司高管对波音公司感到沮丧。但在由两家公司提供大型飞机的紧张市场中，他们别无选择，只能与美国飞机制造商合作。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Airline executives are frustrated with Boeing as its safety crisis has upended their business plans. But in a tight market for large aircraft supplied by two companies, they have little choice but do business with the US planemaker. More here: https://t.co/kcEARMtmNa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 德本汉姆养老金计划同意 7.68 亿美元的克拉拉超级基金交易
item.description:
Debenhams pension scheme agrees $768 mln Clara superfund deal https://t.co/UKZNp5WWo3 pic.twitter.com/iJsOuZKIxl

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：日本央行可能会结束负借贷成本时代。在本期Viewsroom播客中，Breakingviews专栏作家@aimeedonnellan、@guerreraf72和@ugalani认为，许多陷入困境的小企业可能会碰壁。
item.description:
From @Breakingviews: Japan's central bank could end an era of negative borrowing costs. In this Viewsroom podcast, Breakingviews columnists @aimeedonnellan, @guerreraf72 and @ugalani argue that many struggling small businesses could hit a wall https://t.co/mpz18TN7tE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: Breakingviews - 播客：日本利率调整对僵尸企业打击最大
item.description:
Breakingviews - Japan’s rate shift will hit zombie firms hardest: podcast https://t.co/Fiv7xEUZ3a https://t.co/Fiv7xEUZ3a

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 占全球经济总量 98% 的 134 个国家目前正在探索本国货币的数字版本，其中一半以上处于高级开发、试点或启动阶段。但美国正日益落在后面。更多信息，请点击此处：
item.description:
A total of 134 countries representing 98% of the global economy are now exploring digital versions of their currencies, with over half in advanced development, pilot or launch stages. But the United States is falling increasingly behind. More here: https://t.co/m8XNUiHGd8

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 观看：TikTok 的创建者和立法者对迫使应用程序所有者剥离美国资产或面临禁令的投票做出反应

item.title: 消息人士称，亚洲对冲基金 Keystone 的资产翻了一番多，达到 20 亿美元
item.description:
Asian hedge fund Keystone's assets more than double to $2 bln, sources say https://t.co/5ojyqFmMug pic.twitter.com/67w3O1a1iq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 观看：由于投资者在英伟达（Nvidia）和其他芯片制造商的股票上获利了结，同时准备在下周美联储会议之前进一步了解通胀线索，美国市场指数收盘多数下跌
item.description:
WATCH: US market indexes ended mostly lower as investors took profits in shares of Nvidia and other chipmakers, while they prepared for further clues on inflation ahead of next week's Federal Reserve meeting https://t.co/Vc5ePi8dcv pic.twitter.com/nCnAGlLHd0

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 锂是电动汽车电池的关键原材料，其价格的暴跌拖累了中国对这种超轻金属的开采，加之开采过程成本高昂，促使中国重新评估产量增长和新项目计划。
item.description:
A slump in the price of lithium, a key raw material in electric car batteries, is dragging on China's mining of the ultralight metal which together with a costly extraction process is prompting a reassessment of output growth and new project plans https://t.co/3xRWyjt2XZ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 据航空业刊物《Air Current》报道，拉美航空一架波音 787 客机在空中突然俯冲，造成 50 多人受伤，飞行甲板座椅的移动是调查的重点。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The movement of a flight deck seat is a key focus of the probe into a sudden mid-air dive by a LATAM Airlines Boeing 787 plane that left more than 50 people injured, aviation industry publication the Air Current reported. More here: https://t.co/SEeYQr1gQj

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 韩国养老基金支持政府推动解决 "韩国折扣
item.description:
South Korea pension fund backs government push to fix 'Korea discount' https://t.co/MUlZPo2DFH pic.twitter.com/n3KbcsoTdd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 独家报道：四位贸易消息人士称，象牙海岸和加纳的主要非洲可可工厂因无力购买可可豆而停止或削减加工，这意味着全球巧克力价格可能飙升。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Exclusive: Major African cocoa plants in Ivory Coast and Ghana have stopped or cut processing because they cannot afford to buy beans, four trading sources said, meaning chocolate prices around the world are likely to soar. More here: https://t.co/PQTL7ErjTL

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.description:
US homebuilder Lennar beats Q1 profit estimates amid sustained demand for new homes https://t.co/QsVEOI3XA0 pic.twitter.com/aYRDreUXGE

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 企业分红总额从2022年的1.57万亿美元上升到2023年的1.66万亿美元，创历史新高，其中全球最大的分红企业是微软，其次是苹果和埃克森美孚。更多信息
item.description:
The total value of corporate dividends rose from $1.57 trillion in 2022 to hit an all-time high of $1.66 trillion in 2023, with the world's biggest dividend payers being Microsoft, followed by Apple and Exxon Mobil. More here https://t.co/kpe7li6ymW pic.twitter.com/w4FXrOFjOK

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 德本汉姆养老金计划同意 7.68 亿美元的克拉拉超级基金交易

Debenhams pension scheme agrees $768 mln Clara superfund deal https://t.co/9b2omB95hL pic.twitter.com/SJ0cxBHwwR

item.title: 观看：美国众议院以压倒性多数通过一项法案，要求 TikTok 的中国所有者字节跳动在六个月内剥离该短视频应用程序在美国的资产，否则将面临禁令，这是特朗普执政以来对 TikTok 的最大威胁。
item.description:
WATCH: The US House of Representatives overwhelmingly passed a bill that would give TikTok's Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the US assets of the short-video app, or face a ban, in the greatest threat to it since the Trump administration https://t.co/1YffQPEOSC pic.twitter.com/RiYine3eOp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 自特朗普执政以来，美国众议院通过了一项打击短视频应用程序 TikTok 的法案，这是对 TikTok 的最大威胁，该法案规定其中国所有者字节跳动公司（ByteDance）必须在六个月内剥离该应用程序在美国的资产，否则将面临禁令。
item.description:
In the greatest threat to TikTok since the Trump administration, the US House of Representatives passed a bill cracking down on the short-video app that would give its Chinese owner ByteDance about six months to divest the US assets of the app or face ban https://t.co/6vUxMCBHVD pic.twitter.com/6nUpXroCvv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 14, 2024

item.title: 观看：由于投资者从芯片制造商股票中获利了结，S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数走低，同时他们还在为下周美联储会议前的生产者价格数据和有关通胀趋势的进一步线索做准备。
item.description:
WATCH: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq edged lower as investors took profits in chipmaker stocks, while they braced for producer price data and further clues on the inflation trend ahead of next week's Federal Reserve meeting https://t.co/Vc5ePi8L23 pic.twitter.com/79WLViH6CJ

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024

item.title: 2023 年，全球企业分红将达到 1.66 万亿美元，创历史新高，其中银行分红将占增长额的一半。更多信息
item.description:
Corporate dividends globally hit an all-time high of $1.66 trillion in 2023, with record payouts by banks making up half of the growth. More here https://t.co/kpe7li76cu pic.twitter.com/w7X6QBJNPz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 13, 2024
